phrases: So then when the pass comes this way,
The enemy's going to try to block you.
Do not panic, just kick it back a bit.
You have to, like, picture how the game's going to unfold in your head.
And then sort of grind the ball out with the inside of your foot.
You really do not like her, do you?
Not that it is a bad thing that Sadako has new friends.
But seriously, I would be so pissed if she became closer to her than to us.
I made a new friend again.
Honestly, it is not like I put in any effort, so I do not know what to think.
I guess this is what it is like to make friends.
It has not really hit me, but I still feel happy.
Wh-Why did I just see Kazehaya-kun's face?
It has nothing to do with anything.
I am so blessed, yet I feel the opposite...
I cannot really talk to Kazehaya-kun too well.
I have to give you the committee form.
She is so cute, nice and friendly.
Kurumi-chan does not get nervous like that.
You did not notice me calling you.
No, I am sorry for everything.
I wish I could be like Kurumi-chan.
You can talk to me about it if you want.
My role model wants to hear me out.
You have a hard time talking to Kazehaya?
Maybe boys and girls are too different.
I have known him since middle school, and my guess is...
Kazehaya's always been really nice to kids that do not fit in.
He talks to anyone and everyone really casually.
So I think he talks to you normally too.
So it is not anything special that he talks to you.
I do not think you need to get so tense.
But then again, you are so different from Kazehaya.
So maybe you will have a better time talking to someone not as outgoing,
You know, people get along with some people better than others.
I guess that is why you talk to him so casually.
We are sort of alike in a way.
Kazehaya-kun was calling her by name.
You are close to him, are not you?
I see; if that is normal for Kurumi-chan, then no wonder I feel nervous.
Maybe we should head back now.
I could hardly even say hi” to him at first.
And that used to be normal.
I think I am more confident after I talked to you.
That is what I will do.
I am a little nervous, but I will do my best.
I wonder if I could ever become like you someday.
You are good friends with Kazehaya.
Do you think you can help out?
I do not mind being relied on.
So you just want me to make an opportunity for the two of you to be alone?
So then she confessed to him and got rejected.
Well, that was all fine and stuff, but...
Chizu-chan, can you help with her too?
Chizu-chan, it is her this time.
Hey, there is another girl who wants to talk to you.
What is up with you lately?
You are going to help Yumi but not me?
You were on Yumi's side, Chizu?
It is not good for the girls in our class to get split up like this.
Maybe no one should confess to him.
Kazehaya belongs to all of us.
Oh my god, that is so stupid.
Everyone who was afraid of having him taken by someone else joined up.
So anyway, she is not exactly a bad person.
I help her out; she helps me out.
I do not like her type.
Honestly, I do not want to hang out with her.
I sort of know what she is really like now.
Let us see if things really go as she wants.
I am going to get something to drink.
Hey, buy me some tea too.
I wonder if I could ever become like you someday.
I think I went a little too far.
Shit, I called her name but now I am nervous.
I have not talked to you in a while.
I was just going to buy a drink and I saw you here.
I see, Kazehaya-kun was nervous too.
Kazehaya-kun was thinking the same thing I was.
Ever since we went to Ryu's place.
I have not seen you smile in a while.
Oh yeah, Maru's pretty big now.
He makes a mess inside the house.
I need to make him a doghouse soon.
You want to come visit him sometime?
I wonder if he will stay put inside the doghouse.
Oh, he was not calling her by name.
Kazehaya, can I borrow Sawako-chan for a second?
I want to talk to her, girl to girl.
Why does someone always get in the way?
I wonder what she wants to talk to me about.
I thought I had crossed the line and made her angry.
You know, there is someone I like.
I want to go out with him, but I do not think I can.
I wonder what I should do.
She needs my help, but I cannot think of anything.
Actually, I want you to help me.
Me? Be of use to her?
You are the only one who is.
I think this is the first time I have ever been so depended on.
But what exactly do you want me to do?
Do not worry, I will tell you exactly.
But would not I ruin the mood?
It is someone you know well.
Kazehaya is the one I like.
